Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure: Ingredients:
  • Wheat Flour - 350 gms
  • Spring onions - 4 shallots - finely chopped
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly flakes - 1 tsp
  • Ajwain / carom seeds - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Oil - 1 tb sp
  • Water - 150 ml
  • Ghee/ oil / Butter - 3 tb sp - to cook Paratha
Procedure:
  • In a mixing bowl and wheat flour, chopped spring onions, salt, Ajwain/ carom seeds, red chilly powder, red chilly flakes & turmeric powder
  • Mix well
  • Add water and make perfect non sticky dough
  • Close with lid
  • Rest for 15-20 mins
  • After 20 mins Add 1 spoon oil and knead
  • Divide dough into equal parts
  • Make round balls
  • Heat tawa over medium heat
  • Take a dough ball and dust some flour
  • Roll it towards upwards and downwards to make round shape
  • Put rolled spring Onion Paratha on tawa
  • Flip roti when bubbling started
  • Apply oil
  • Cook both sides equally by applying oil
  • Serve immediately with Gravy curry
  • Happy cooking & Enjoy your Day ðŸ˜Š
